#labels Phase-Deploy,Phase-Support
= How to create your own Tellurium testing project with IntelliJ 7.0 =

== Prerequisites ==
  * Download IntellJ from the following location.
      {{{
      http://www.jetbrains.com/idea/download/index.html
      }}}

  * Download Groovy 1.5.6 from the following location and unpack to your system.
     {{{
     http://groovy.codehaus.org/Download
     }}}

  * Download and install Groovy plugin JetGroovy? for IntelliJ using IntelliJ Plugin management GUI.

http://tellurium-users.googlegroups.com/web/Image001.png?gsc=M_9GdgsAAABK-O78oCxGhlt_R137VKqE

  * Download the Tellurium tellurium-0.4.0-u01.jar file from the following location, which is for Java 6. If you use Java 5, please download the tellurium-0.4.0-java5.jar file.
    {{{
    http://code.google.com/p/aost/downloads/list
    }}}

  * Launch IntelliJ. The workspace in the example is set to C:\Workspace. (You can define any directory based on your preference.)
  * File > New Project > Create Project From Scratch.

http://tellurium-users.googlegroups.com/web/Image002.png

  * Set the project details as shown below and Click Next.

http://tellurium-users.googlegroups.com/web/Image003.png

  * Set the source directory and Click Next.

http://tellurium-users.googlegroups.com/web/Image004.png

  * Select the Groovy checkbox and the Groovy version. Click Next.

http://tellurium-users.googlegroups.com/web/Image005.png

  * Project Settings > Module > GoogleSearch > Dependencies. Add the jar files for seleinum java client, selenium server, junit4.4 and tellurium.

http://tellurium-users.googlegroups.com/web/Image006.png

  * Create a new groovy file. NewGoogleStartPage

http://tellurium-users.googlegroups.com/web/Image007.png

http://tellurium-users.googlegroups.com/web/Image008.png

http://tellurium-users.googlegroups.com/web/Image009.png

  * Create a new Java file. GoogleStartPageJavaTestCase

http://tellurium-users.googlegroups.com/web/Image010.png

  * Create a new TelluriumConfig.groovy file. C:\workspace\GoogleSearch\TelluriumConfig

http://tellurium-users.googlegroups.com/web/Image011.png

  * Right click on the GoogleStartPageJavaTestCase > Run "GoogleStartPageJavaTestCase"

http://tellurium-users.googlegroups.com/web/Image012.png

The test will result as passed.
